reviewText: More moralizing "feel good" hogwash for teachers from a person who never taught. What else is new in education?

I have struggled with evaluation using grades for years now, and was pondering getting rid of grades because of research suggesting learning and grading had little to do with each other. Indeed, grades seem to reduce learning. I can't believe how much time I've spent calculating or arguing with students about grades--what a waste of time for everyone! this DVD was the final convincing piece; I'm never grading again.
Great information! This DVD has provided me with a new perspective regarding school and homework. I would recommend to all parents.

This is one of the best educators in the world today. His investigations on punishments and rewards and its deleterious effects are astonishing, specially in a country where behaviorism was implemented.
